scripts.test:unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register packages/*/test/unit/*.test.ts $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.test:integration:chain: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration/chain/*.test.ts $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.test:integration:swap: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration/swap/*.test.ts $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.test:integration:tx: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration/tx/*.test.ts $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.test:integration:wallet: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration/wallet/*.test.ts $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.test:integration:contract: cross-env NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration/contract/*.test.ts $npm_package_options_mocha

scripts.test:integration:external: cross-env NODE_ENV=test RUN_EXTERNAL=true TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.json" mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=production WEBPACK_WATCH=true lerna run build --parallel
scripts.new:version: lerna version --no-push --no-git-tag-version && lerna clean --yes && lerna bootstrap
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
